content: hamster enjoy this easy free pattern keep in mind that assembly takes a bit of time due to all the pieces i used a 3 5 mm hook for a majority of the project with moderately tight stitches which resulted in 3 8 inch tall x 3 25 inch wide hamster if you wish for a bigger or smaller hamster you can use larger or smaller hooks respectively all crocheting is done in continuous rounds no
